DOC.brief_summary: The metabolic syndrome rise worldwide consequence continue obesity epidemic . The current obesogenic environment make regulation energy intake difficult impedes maintenance weight loss . Dietary pattern and/or ingredient curb hunger reduce energy intake critically need . We hypothesize inclusion protein prebiotic fiber diet reduce adiposity overweight obesity adult .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Protein Prebiotic Fiber Intake Adiposity Overweight Obese Adults
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective study assess effect protein prebiotic fiber intake change adiposity overweight obese adult population . Primary objective - To determine effect 12 week protein ( 10 g/day ) prebiotic fiber ( 16 g/day ) intake change body composition , chiefly body fat . Secondary objective - To measure change appetite follow 12 week protein ( 10 g/day ) prebiotic fiber ( 16 g/day ) intake . Other outcome include change quality life rating gut microbiota .
DOC.criteria: Males female Age 18 70 year BMI 25 38 kg/m2 Stable body weight least 3 month prior study Type 1 diabetes Clinically significant cardiovascular , liver pancreas disease Major gastrointestinal surgery Pregnant lactate Concomitant use weight loss medication , diet exercise regime Antibiotic use precede 3 month enrollment Weight loss > 3 kg within precede 3 month enrollment Use bulk laxative , fiber supplement probiotic/prebiotic supplement
